Description: Identity-StandardUsers Template. This creates Standard IAM Users within the Identity Account. Due to what appears to be a bug in the User Resource Groups Property which ignores changes during Stack Updates, we are currently listing all group memberships explicitly through separate UsertoGroupAddition Resources.

StandardManagedPoliciesStackName.Description: Name of the CloudFormation Stack containing Standard ManagedPolicies.
StandardManagedPoliciesStackName.ConstraintDescription: must begin with an upper case letter and contain alphanumeric characters and dashes.

StandardGroupsStackName.Description: Name of the CloudFormation Stack containing Standard Groups.
StandardGroupsStackName.ConstraintDescription: must begin with an upper case letter and contain alphanumeric characters and dashes.
